text: Yves Piétrasanta (19 August 1939 - 28 May 2022) was a French politician and academic. He was born in Mèze, France. He was a member of the Radical Party of the Left. He was also a member of The Greens. From 1977 until 2001, he was the Mayor of Mèze. He also was a Member of the European Parliament from 1999 until 2004. Piétrasanta died on 28 May 2022 at the age of 82.Yves Pietrasanta nous a quittés ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:MEPs for France Category:French mayors Category:French academics Category:Politicians from Occitanie Category:People from Hérault
title: Yves Piétrasanta
